segments.text: Hello . Can I help you , ma'am ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Could you tell me how to send some money to someone with an account with a bank in Germany ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you can pay by mail , telegraphic or SWIFT transfer . Or you can have a banker's draft and mail it yourself to the beneficiary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends on the amount and how fast you want that person to receive the money . A SWIFT transfer is the fastest method but a banker's draft is usually the cheapest . How much do you wanna send ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you send it by mail payment order ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . Can I send it more quickly ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . You can have a Telegraphic or a SWIFT transfer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And how long do those take ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Both a Telegraphic Transfer and a SWIFT transfer will normally be credited to the payee's account within three or four working days , depending on whether the beneficiary's bank is among our correspondent banks or we have to route the transfer through a third bank .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . How can I pay by Telegraphic Transfer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have to fill out this form , ma'am .
segments.speaker: S1
